member.name: T:ASC.Api.Employee.EmployeeApi
member.summary: Access to user profiles

member.name: M:ASC.Api.Employee.EmployeeApi.GetMe
member.summary: Returns the detailed information about the current user profile.

member.name: M:ASC.Api.Employee.EmployeeApi.GetAll
member.summary: Returns a list of profiles for all the portal users.
member.remarks: This method returns the partial profiles. Use more specific method to get full profiles.

member.name: M:ASC.Api.Employee.EmployeeApi.GetByStatus(ASC.Core.Users.EmployeeStatus)
member.summary: Returns a list of profiles filtered by user status.

member.name: M:ASC.Api.Employee.EmployeeApi.GetById(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the detailed information about a profile of the user with the name specified in the request.
member.short: Get a profile by user name

member.name: M:ASC.Api.Employee.EmployeeApi.GetByEmail(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the detailed information about a profile of the user with the email specified in the request.
member.short: Get a profile by user email

member.name: M:ASC.Api.Employee.EmployeeApi.GetSearch(System.String)
member.summary: Returns a list of profiles for all the portal users matching the search query.

member.name: M:ASC.Api.Employee.EmployeeApi.GetPeopleSearch(System.String)
member.summary: Returns a list of users matching the search query.

member.name: M:ASC.Api.Employee.EmployeeApi.GetAdvanced(ASC.Core.Users.EmployeeStatus,System.String)
member.summary: Returns a list of users matching the status filter and search query.

member.name: M:ASC.Api.Employee.EmployeeApi.SaveUsers(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Imports the new portal users with the first name, last name and email address.
member.param: Imports users as guests (true) or not (false)

member.name: M:ASC.Api.Employee.EmployeeApi.GetStatus
member.summary: Returns a status of the current user.

member.name: M:ASC.Api.Employee.EmployeeApi.GetFullByFilter(System.Nullable{ASC.Core.Users.EmployeeStatus},System.Nullable{System.Guid},System.Nullable{ASC.Core.Users.EmployeeActivationStatus},System.Nullable{ASC.Core.Users.EmployeeType},System.Nullable{System.Boolean})
member.summary: Returns a list of users with full information about them matching the parameters specified in the request.
member.short: Search users and their information by extended filter
member.param: Specifies if the user is administrator or not
member.returns: List of users with their information

member.name: M:ASC.Api.Employee.EmployeeApi.GetSimpleByFilter(System.Nullable{ASC.Core.Users.EmployeeStatus},System.Nullable{System.Guid},System.Nullable{ASC.Core.Users.EmployeeActivationStatus},System.Nullable{ASC.Core.Users.EmployeeType},System.Nullable{System.Boolean})
member.summary: Returns a list of users matching the parameters specified in the request.
member.param: Specifies if the user is administrator or not

member.summary: Adds a new portal user with the first name, last name, email address and several optional parameters specified in the request.
member.param: Specifies if this is a guest (true) or user (false)
User registration date. If it is not specified, then the current date will be set

member.summary: Adds a new activated portal user with the first name, last name, email address and several optional parameters specified in the request.
member.param: Specifies if this is a guest (true) or user (false)
User registration date. If it is not specified, then the current date will be set

member.summary: Updates the data for the selected portal user with the first name, last name, email address and/or optional parameters specified in the request.
member.param: Specifies if this is a guest (true) or user (false)
New user registration date. If it is not specified, then the current date will be set

member.name: M:ASC.Api.Employee.EmployeeApi.DeleteMember(System.String)
member.summary: Deletes a user with the ID specified in the request from the portal.

member.name: M:ASC.Api.Employee.EmployeeApi.UpdateMemberContacts(System.String,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{ASC.Api.Employee.Contact})
member.summary: Updates the contact information of the user with the ID specified in the request merging new data with the present portal data.

member.name: M:ASC.Api.Employee.EmployeeApi.SetMemberContacts(System.String,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{ASC.Api.Employee.Contact})
member.summary: Sets the contacts of the user with the ID specified in the request replacing the present portal data with the new data.

member.name: M:ASC.Api.Employee.EmployeeApi.DeleteMemberContacts(System.String,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{ASC.Api.Employee.Contact})
member.summary: Deletes the contacts of the user with the ID specified in the request from the portal.

member.name: M:ASC.Api.Employee.EmployeeApi.GetMemberPhoto(System.String)
member.summary: Returns a photo of the user with the ID specified in the request.

member.name: M:ASC.Api.Employee.EmployeeApi.UpdateMemberPhoto(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Updates a photo of the user with the ID specified in the request.

member.name: M:ASC.Api.Employee.EmployeeApi.DeleteMemberPhoto(System.String)
member.summary: Deletes a photo of the user with the ID specified in the request.

member.name: M:ASC.Api.Employee.EmployeeApi.CreateMemberPhotoThumbnails(System.String,System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Creates a photo thumbnail by coordinates of the original image specified in the request.

member.name: M:ASC.Api.Employee.EmployeeApi.SendUserPassword(System.String)
member.summary: Reminds a password to the user using the email specified in the request.

member.name: M:ASC.Api.Employee.EmployeeApi.ChangeUserPassword(System.Guid,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Sets a new password and email to the user with the ID specified in the request.

member.name: M:ASC.Api.Employee.EmployeeApi.UpdateEmployeeActivationStatus(ASC.Core.Users.EmployeeActivationStatus,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.Guid})
member.summary: Sets the required activation status to the list of users with the IDs specified in the request.

member.name: M:ASC.Api.Employee.EmployeeApi.UpdateUserType(ASC.Core.Users.EmployeeType,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.Guid})
member.summary: Changes a type (user or visitor) for the users with the IDs specified in the request.

member.name: M:ASC.Api.Employee.EmployeeApi.UpdateUserStatus(ASC.Core.Users.EmployeeStatus,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.Guid})
member.summary: Changes a status for the users with the IDs specified in the request.

member.name: M:ASC.Api.Employee.EmployeeApi.ResendUserInvites(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.Guid})
member.summary: Resends emails to the users who have not activated their emails.

member.name: M:ASC.Api.Employee.EmployeeApi.RemoveUsers(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.Guid})
member.summary: Deletes a list of the users with the IDs specified in the request.

member.name: M:ASC.Api.Employee.EmployeeApi.SendInstructionsToDelete
member.summary: Sends instructions for deleting a user profile.

member.name: M:ASC.Api.Employee.EmployeeApi.JoinToAffiliateProgram
member.summary: Joins to the affiliate programm by the link.

member.name: M:ASC.Api.Employee.EmployeeApi.LinkAccount(System.String)
member.summary: Links a third-party account specified in the request to the user profile.
member.param: Third-party profile in the serialized format

member.name: M:ASC.Api.Employee.EmployeeApi.UnlinkAccount(System.String)
member.summary: Unlinks a third-party account specified in the request from the user profile.

member.name: M:ASC.Api.Employee.EmployeeApi.GetReassignProgress(System.Guid)
member.summary: Returns the progress of the started reassigning process for the user with the ID specified in the request.
member.param: User ID whose data is reassigned

member.name: M:ASC.Api.Employee.EmployeeApi.TerminateReassign(System.Guid)
member.summary: Terminates the reassigning process for the user with the ID specified in the request.
member.param: User ID whose data is reassigned

member.name: M:ASC.Api.Employee.EmployeeApi.StartReassign(System.Guid,System.Guid,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Starts the reassigning process for the user with the ID specified in the request.
member.param: User ID whose data will be reassigned to another user
User ID to whom all the data will be reassigned
Deletes a profile when reassignment will be finished or not

member.name: M:ASC.Api.Employee.EmployeeApi.GetRemoveProgress(System.Guid)
member.summary: Returns the progress of the started removing process for the user with the ID specified in the request.

member.name: M:ASC.Api.Employee.EmployeeApi.TerminateRemove(System.Guid)
member.summary: Terminates the removing process for the user with the ID specified in the request.

member.name: M:ASC.Api.Employee.EmployeeApi.StartRemove(System.Guid)
member.summary: Starts the removing process for the user with the ID specified in the request.

member.name: T:ASC.Api.Employee.GroupsApi
member.summary: Access to the groups.

member.name: M:ASC.Api.Employee.GroupsApi.GetAll
member.summary: Returns the general information about all the groups, such as group ID and group manager.
member.remarks: This method returns partial group information.

member.name: M:ASC.Api.Employee.GroupsApi.GetById(System.Guid)
member.summary: Returns the detailed information about the selected group: group name, category, description, manager, members and parent group if it exists.
member.remarks: That method returns full group information.

member.name: M:ASC.Api.Employee.GroupsApi.GetByUserId(System.Guid)
member.summary: Returns a list of groups for the user with the ID specified in the request.

member.name: M:ASC.Api.Employee.GroupsApi.AddGroup(System.Guid,System.String,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.Guid})
member.summary: Adds a new group with the group manager, name and members specified in the request.

member.name: M:ASC.Api.Employee.GroupsApi.UpdateGroup(System.Guid,System.Guid,System.String,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.Guid})
member.summary: Updates the existing group changing the group manager, name and/or members.

member.name: M:ASC.Api.Employee.GroupsApi.DeleteGroup(System.Guid)
member.summary: Deletes a group with the ID specified in the request from the list of groups on the portal.

member.name: M:ASC.Api.Employee.GroupsApi.TransferMembersTo(System.Guid,System.Guid)
member.summary: Moves all the members from the selected group to another one specified in the request.

member.name: M:ASC.Api.Employee.GroupsApi.SetMembersTo(System.Guid,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.Guid})
member.summary: Manages the group members deleting the current members and setting new ones specified in the request instead.

member.name: M:ASC.Api.Employee.GroupsApi.AddMembersTo(System.Guid,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.Guid})
member.summary: Manages the group members keeping the current members and adding new ones specified in the request instead.

member.name: M:ASC.Api.Employee.GroupsApi.SetManager(System.Guid,System.Guid)
member.summary: Sets a user with the ID specified in the request as a manager.

member.name: M:ASC.Api.Employee.GroupsApi.RemoveMembersFrom(System.Guid,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.Guid})
member.summary: Removes the group members specified in the request from the selected group.
